name: Just Jump! (MoGamer09)
description: This game is all about jumping from platform to platform, to collect many coins, and have invinate fun due to the random level generation! Its that kind of game to play when you have no clue what to do because the internet broke down... You know what I mean... You can play this game everyehre, as long you have your handy. Unlock diffrent colors for your player as well as wonderful faces to put on while jumping from block to block.
